root.name: Gibbage
root.description: Overview Gibbage is an independent game developed by the UK based Zombie Cow Studios. It is a 2 player side-scrolling multiplayer shooter. It was released for PC only on April 25, 2006. It was also the very first game that Zombie Cow Studios developed and released. DistributionCurrently Gibbage is only available for purchase from the Zombie Cow Studios website.
